_description: John Lydgate, a Ballade on an Ale Seller — eleven stanzas rhyme royal

BodRawC48.First Lines:
REmembryng on the grete vnstabilnesseThe plesaunt looke also the
                    countenaunce…
BodRawC48.Last Lines:
…The meenyng is preys vnto them applieThat wil be trewe whan
                    men in them assye
BodRawC48.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble,
                        ed.  
             John Lydgate: The Minor Poems, Vol. II: Secular Poems.
EETS
         o.s. 192 (1934); repr. 1961: 2.429-32.
